conventional.translation[0].definitions[: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type
Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
always following the behaviour and attitudes that most people in a society consider to be normal, right, and socially acceptable, so that you seem slightly boring
a strong believer in conventional morals
He is conventional in his approach to life.
conventional weapons and wars do not use nuclear explosives or weapons
conventional.translation[1].definitions[: a conventional way of doing something is the way that has been used or available for some time and is considered to be normal
Conventional measures of stock prices really arenâ€™t good guides to value.
